title: Inkxaso yeTempile ye-Orbital-Joyina iMishini
heading: Inkxaso yeTempile ye-Orbital
vision: Ngomhla wama-28 kaNovemba ngo-2025 , iTempile ye-Orbital iya kuqalisa isuka eIndiya ikhwele i-rocket ye-ISRO . Isathelayithi yobugcisa ethatha inxaxheba evela kwiGlobal South, lilitye lesikhumbuzo lokubandakanywa ngokupheleleyo, iqonga lemfundo, kunye ne-catalyst yencoko yehlabathi malunga nekamva lezinto ezingcwele kwixesha lobuchwephesha, i-AI kunye nokuhlola indawo.
videoCaption: Intshayelelo yevidiyo ye-Orbital Temple, i-1 min.

accomplished.heading: Oko Sikufezileyo
accomplished.content: Emva kweminyaka emine yophando kunye nophuhliso, i-mission ilungile. Sigqibe ihardware kunye nophuhliso lwesoftware yesathelayithi, saphumelela iimvavanyo zeshaker ezisemthethweni ezifunekayo kwisiqinisekiso senqwelomoya, kwaye saqukumbela isivumelwano sethu ne-ISRO. Isathelayithi yakhiwe. Itekhnoloji iyasebenza. Sivunyiwe ukuba siqalise.

needs.heading: Yintoni Esiyidingayo Inkxaso
needs.intro: Ukugqibezela lo msebenzi uyimbali kunye nokwandisa impembelelo yawo, sifuna inkxaso kumacandelo amahlanu abalulekileyo:

decade.heading: Ishumi Leminyaka Elizayo
decade.paragraph1: Kwiminyaka eyi-10 ezayo, le satellite iya kujikeleza uMhlaba, iphendula kumagama athunyelwe kuzo zonke iikona zomhlaba. Inkqubo yemfundo ijolise ekuqeqesheni amawakawaka olutsha kubuchwepheshe besathelayithi, ukwaphula i -Space Gap for the Global South. Ifilimu iya kufikelela kwizigidi kwihlabathi liphela, ivuselela iincoko malunga nokubakho, inkumbulo, kunye nengcwele.
decade.paragraph2: ITempile ye-Orbital ibambisene noSathi Roy kunye neRoy Foundation ukwenza lo mbono weshumi leminyaka ubaluleke ngokwenkcubeko. I-Roy Foundation yinkampani engenzi nzuzo ezinikele ekwandiseni ukufikelela kwimfundo yokomoya, ukuphiliswa ngokweemvakalelo, kunye nezixhobo zokuqonda kuluntu olungagcinwanga kwihlabathi liphela, ukudibanisa ubulumko bakudala kunye netekhnoloji yale mihla ukudala ilizwe eliqaphela ngakumbi, eliqhagamsheleneyo, nelinovelwano. Sikunye, sakha isiseko sokuqinisekisa ukuba i-Orbital Temple iba yintshukumo ehlala ihleli efikelela kuluntu kwihlabathi liphela.
decade.paragraph3: Inkxaso yakho ayinikeli nje imali yokusungula; idala intshukumo eya kuvakala iminyaka elishumi kwaye ikhuthaze isizukulwana esilandelayo samagcisa kunye neenjineli.

individualDonations.heading: Iminikelo Yomntu Ngamnye
individualDonations.intro: Joyina ubuthunywa kwinqanaba elisebenzela wena. Abaxhasi ngabanye basisiseko sale projekthi yembali.

orbitalFriend.title: Orbital Friend
orbitalFriend.benefits: Ufumana: Igama kwiwebhusayithi uluhlu lwewonga · Isatifikethi esenzelwe wena se-orbital xa kusungulwa ngesathelayithi

satelliteSupporter.title: Umxhasi weSatellite
satelliteSupporter.benefits: Ufumana: Zonke izibonelelo zoMhlobo we-Orbital · Ufikelelo olukhethekileyo kwi-app yesatellite yokulandela umkhondo · Igcisa enkosi ngomyalezo wevidiyo · Irisithi exhuzulwa irhafu

spaceAdvocate.title: uMthetheleli weNdawo
spaceAdvocate.benefits: Ufumana: Zonke izibonelelo zoMxhasi weSatellite · Igama elishicilelweyo kwiikhredithi zamaxwebhu · Isimemo sokuhlolwa kwamaxwebhu abucala · Uhlaziyo lwekota oluvela kwiqela · Irisithi exhuzulwa irhafu

fundingOpportunities.heading: Inkxaso-mali kwiCandelo elithile
fundingOpportunities.intro: Igalelo lakho lixhasa ngokuthe ngqo imiba ethile yobuthunywa. Khetha into ethetha nawe, okanye udibanise ezininzi ukwenza impembelelo enkulu.

launch.title: Inkxaso-mali yokuQaliswa kweSithuba
launch.description: Eyona ndleko yokuphehlelelwa kwirokethi ye-ISRO ngoNovemba 28, 2025 . Oku kuthumela iTempile ye-Orbital kwi-orbit, apho iya kuhlala ishumi leminyaka njengesathelayithi yobugcisa ethatha inxaxheba kunye netempile esibhakabhakeni, efikelelekayo kuye nabani na emhlabeni.
launch.benefits: Ufumana: Isihloko esithi "Launch Sponsor" · Ifakwe kuwo onke amaphephandaba · Uvumo lwamaxwebhu esikrinini · Ufikelelo lweVIP lokusungula imisitho · Joyina iifowuni zevidiyo zekota kunye no-Edson kunye neqela lobuthunywa · Isatifikethi esinedatha yesathelayithi ye-orbital · Irisithi exhuzulwa iRhafu

travel.title: Inkxaso-mali kuhambo lwaMagcisa oluya eIndiya
travel.description: Ukuhamba, indawo yokuhlala, kunye neendleko zokuvelisa umzobi u-Edson Pavoni kunye neqela eliphambili lokungqina ukuqaliswa eIndiya ngoNovemba 28, 2025 . Olu hambo lubalulekile kumboniso bhanyabhanya, kumajelo eendaba, kunye nokumela iGlobal South ngalo mzuzu uyimbali.
travel.benefits: Ufumana: Enkosi buqu kwigcisa · Ngasemva-kwe-imboniso ufikelelo lwamaxwebhu · Igama elikwiikhredithi zamaxwebhu · Irisithi exhuzulwa irhafu

carbon.title: Inkxaso-mali kwiNkqubo yeCarbon Offset
carbon.description: Konke ukukhutshwa kwekhabhoni kuya kuncitshiswa, kubandakanywa ukuqaliswa kwe-rocket kunye nokwenziwa kwesathelayithi. Sisebenza kunye neenkqubo eziqinisekisiweyo ze-carbon offset ukuqinisekisa ukuba le mishini ishiya indawo engalunganga yokusingqongileyo.
carbon.benefits: Ufumana: Igama kuluhlu lwembeko kwiwebhusayithi · Isatifikethi esenzelwe wena · Irisithi exhuzulwa irhafu

education.title: Inkxaso-mali kwiNkqubo yezeMfundo
education.description: Phuhlisa kwaye uqalise ikhosi epheleleyo yeelwimi ezininzi yokufundisa ulutsha lweGlobal South indlela yokwakha iisathelayithi. Kubandakanya uphuhliso lwekharityhulamu, ukuveliswa kwevidiyo, ukusingathwa kweqonga, kunye nonyaka wokuqala wokufundiswa kwabafundi abangagcinwanga kakuhle. Uyila iziseko zophuhliso ezihlala ixesha elide zokufundisa emajukujukwini.
education.benefits: Ufumana: ukuvunywa "Umxhasi woMseki wezeMfundo" · Ukufundiswa kwezifundo egameni lakho · Okufakwe kwizixhobo zemfundo · Dibana neqela lokuqala labafundi oluxhaswa ngemali yokufunda (ngokoqobo okanye ngokobuqu) · Icandelo leempawu zoxwebhu · Ithuba lokuthetha kwimisitho yokusungula · Irisithi exhuzulwa irhafu

docPreProd.title: Inkxaso-mali yokuVeliswa kwangaphambili koXwebhu
docPreProd.description: Inkxaso-mali kwisigaba sokuqala "Yintoni eyenza iTempile?" ingxelo. Kubandakanya ukuqhuba udliwano-ndlebe olu-2 olunzulu eIndiya kunye neenkokheli zengcinga kunye nabasebenzi bokomoya, ukuhamba kwabasebenzi abancinci kunye nemveliso, kunye nokuhlelwa kwemifanekiso yangaphambi kokuveliswa. Esi sigaba siseka isiseko soxwebhu kwaye siqinisekisa isikhokelo soyilo.
docPreProd.benefits: Ufumana: Ityala elinguMvelisi eliDityanisiweyo · Igama elikwiikhredithi zengxelo · Uvavanyo lwabucala lwemifanekiso eshukumayo yangaphambili · Ufikelelo ngasemva kwescene · Irisithi exhuzulwa irhafu

docProd.title: Inkxaso-mali kwiMveliso yoXwebhu
docProd.description: Imveliso epheleleyo kunye nokuveliswa emva kwe "Yintoni eyenza iTempile?" , umboniso ophonononga ukuhlangana kwezobugcisa, itekhnoloji, kunye nengcwele. Kubandakanya ukwenziwa kwefilimu kumazwe amaninzi, udliwano-ndlebe olongezelelweyo kunye neenkokheli zengcinga, ukuhlelwa okubanzi, ukuhlelwa kombala, uyilo lwesandi, kunye nokuhlolwa kokuqala eIndiya naseNYC .
docProd.benefits: Ufumana: Ikhredithi yoMvelisi oLawulayo · Iboniswe ekuvuleni iikhredithi · Ukuhlolwa kwabucala kwiindwendwe zakho · Izimemo ze-premiere yehlabathi (zombini izixeko) · Isidlo sabucala kunye no-Edson kunye nomlawuli wengxelo phambi komboniso wokuqala · Ukufikelela emva-kwemiboniso · Irisithi exhuzulwa irhafu

artCollector.title: Yiba nguMqokeleli woBugcisa weTempile ye-Orbital kuphela
artCollector.imageCaption: Itempile ye-Orbital kwi-13th Mercosul Biennial, ePorto Alegre. Ifoto nguClara Marques.
artCollector.paragraph1: Iisathelayithi ezintathu ezifanayo zenzelwe lo msebenzi. Omnye uya kuphehlelela emajukujukwini ngoNovemba 28, 2025. Umntu uya kwimiboniso yeemyuziyam kwihlabathi jikelele. Enye igcinelwe umqokeleli onesisa ofuna ukuxhasa ngemali lo mbono kwaye abe neqhekeza lembali yobugcisa bendawo.
artCollector.paragraph2: Le asiyokopi; yenye yeesathelayithi zoqobo ezintathu. Isiphekepheke esisebenza ngokupheleleyo esikwangumfanekiso oqingqiweyo . Isathelayithi inomlinganiselo we 5cm³ kwaye inobunzima be 245g , kunye nedome eyenziwe ngegolide .
artCollector.paragraph4: Njengomqokeleli, uya kufumana ukufakela okufanayo okwenzelwe i- 13th Mercosul Biennial , umboniso opheleleyo we-museological obonisa i-satellite njengobugcisa kunye nobugcisa. Olu fakelo lubonisiwe kwiindawo eziphambili zamazwe ngamazwe kwaye lumele owona mgangatho uphezulu wokuboniswa kobugcisa basemajukujukwini.
artCollector.paragraph5: Inkxaso yakho inceda ukuxhasa ngemali yonke imbono: ukuqaliswa, inkqubo yemfundo, kunye nengxelo eya kubangela iingxoxo zehlabathi malunga nezinto ezingcwele kwixesha lobuchwephesha, i-AI kunye nokuhlola indawo. Igama lakho lidityaniswa ngokusisigxina nalo msebenzi wembali.

gratitude.heading: Ngombulelo Kubaxhasi Bethu
gratitude.intro: ITempile ye-Orbital yenziwa ukuba ibekho ngamaziko, abantu, kunye namakholwa ekudityaniswe ngokugqibeleleyo abaqondayo ukuba ubugcisa budala iingcinga zangomso.

pearmill.title: Umxhasi osungulayo
pearmill.description: I-Pearmill yenye yee-arhente zentengiso ezikhula ngokukhawuleza ezikhula ngokukhawuleza e-US, iqela labaqulunqi, abathengisi, kunye neenjineli ezisebenza kunye ukunceda ukukhulisa ezinye zezona ziqalo zibalaseleyo emhlabeni. Inkxaso yabo yesisa yenza ukuba iqela leTempile ye-Orbital lithenge amacandelo abalulekileyo kunye nokuphuhlisa i-hardware evulekileyo eyenza le mishini yesathelayithi yenzeke.

gratitude.yourName: Igama lakho linokuba lapha. Sijoyine ekudaleni imbali.

people.heading: Abantu abasemva kwale Mishini
people.intro: ITempile ye-Orbital yi-10 yeminyaka yokuzinikela. Ikhokelwa ngabantu ababini abachithe ubomi babo benxibelelanisa ubugcisa, itekhnoloji, kunye nonxibelelwano lwabantu, kwaye abo bakha iziseko zophuhliso ukugcina lo mbono weshumi leminyaka elizayo.

edson.name: Edson Pavoni
edson.paragraph1: U-Edson ligcisa kunye netekhnoloji ephonononga ukusondelelana kwabantu kwindawo yokuhlangana yobugcisa kunye netekhnoloji. Umsebenzi wakhe ubandakanya ukufakelwa kwezakhiwo, imibongo, ukufota, kunye netekhnoloji yesathelayithi.
edson.paragraph2: Umsebenzi wakhe uboniswe kwi-13th Mercosul Biennial (eBrazil), i-IX International Biennale (Uzbekistan), kunye ne-NTU Global Digital Art Prize (eSingapore).
edson.paragraph3: Ngaphezulu kweminyaka engama-20 kwinkalo yobugcisa kunye neteknoloji , usebenze kunye namaqela okudala kwi- 2016 Rio Olympics kunye ne -Inter American Development Bank . Ebizwa ngokuba yenye yeengcali ze-50 zezona zintsha zaseBrazil yi-Proxxima Magazine, ufumene i-IF Design Awards ezimbini ezilandelelanayo (2017-2018) kwaye wayeyi- Lumen Prize Futures Award finalist. Umsebenzi wakhe uye waboniswa kwiminyaka emibini kwaye thaca Ludwig Museum of Contemporary Art (Budapest), Inhotim Institute (Brazil), kunye Design kunye Fashion Museum (Lisbon), kunye nemiboniso eNew York, Beijing, Singapore, Dubai, Rio de Janeiro, kunye nezinye izixeko.

sathi.name: Sathi Roy
sathi.paragraph1: U-Sathi ungumsunguli we -Roy Foundation , i-nonprofit ezinikele ekwandiseni ukufikelela kwimfundo yokomoya, ukuphilisa ngokweemvakalelo, kunye nezixhobo zokuqonda kuluntu olungagcinwanga kwihlabathi jikelele. Isiseko sisebenzisana nezikolo, amaziko enkcubeko, kunye nemibutho yasekuhlaleni ukuhambisa izixhobo zempilo ye-AI-powered, ikharityhulam yoluntu, kunye neendaba ezikhuthaza inguqu.
sathi.paragraph2: Ngemvelaphi kwi-neuroscience, i-coaching, kunye nobunkokeli, i-Sathi iye yakha kwaye yakhokela amaqela kuwo wonke uMntla Melika kunye ne-Indiya, ivelisa i-600 yezigidi zeedola kwiintengiso zonyaka kwilinge elinye. Kwakhona ungumsunguli we -OHM , i-digital-first spiritual movement, i-Co-Founder ye- SUTE (i-digital AI-driven office platform), kwaye isebenza njengoMcebisi kunye neNtloko yeGlobal yokuKhula kwi -RISE Global Creative .
sathi.paragraph3: Njengomfazi waseBengali-waseMelika odibanisa iintanda-bulumko zaseMpuma nezaseNtshona, uSathi uzisa imbono eyodwa kwiintshukumo zokomoya nezobugcisa kwinkulungwane yama-21. Ngothungelwano olukhulayo lwabalandeli abangama-65,000+ kunye nangaphezulu kwezigidi ezingama-40 zokubonakala kwi-intanethi , wakha uluntu lwehlabathi olunxibelelana kwiiyantlukwano zenkcubeko nezomoya.

people.together: Sikunye neRoy Foundation, sakha iphulo leminyaka eli-10 elidibanisa ubugcisa, itekhnoloji, imfundo, kunye nengcwele, siqala ngokuphehlelelwa ngesathelayithi ngoNovemba 28, 2025, kwaye siqhubeke nentshukumo eza kufikelela kuluntu olungakhuselekanga kwihlabathi jikelele kwaye ikhuthaze isizukulwana esilandelayo.

join.heading: Dibana nathi
join.content: Isathelayithi yakhiwe. Iteknoloji ilungile. Umhla wokuqaliswa umiselwe: ngoNovemba 28, 2025 . Eli lixesha lokujoyina i-mission ecinga kwakhona ukuba ubugcisa bunokwenza ntoni, bunokuya phi, kwaye bunokusebenzela bani na.

fundSpecific.heading: Inkxaso-mali kwiCandelo eliKhethekileyo okanye ube liQela eliQalayo
fundSpecific.description: Khetha elinye lamathuba enkxaso-mali angasentla, buza malunga nokuba ngumqokeleli wezobugcisa, okanye uxoxe ngenkxaso-mali yesiko ehambelana nombono wakho.

generalDonation.heading: Yenza umnikelo oxhuzulwa iRhafu
generalDonation.description: Yonke iminikelo, emikhulu okanye encinci, ixhasa uthumo kwaye itsalwa irhafu kumxhasi wethu wemali, iField.

taxInfo.heading: Tax-Deductible Giving
taxInfo.paragraph1: ITempile ye-Orbital yiprojekthi exhaswa ngemali nguMmandla (iNdawo yokuSebenza i-Inc.) , i- 501 (c) (3) umbutho ongenzi nzuzo ozinze eNew York. Yonke iminikelo yase-US itsalwa irhafu ngokomthetho.
taxInfo.paragraph2:
Intsimi
75 Maiden Lane, Suite 906
ENew York, NY 10038
thefield.org
taxInfo.paragraph3: Xa unikela ngetshekhi, nceda wenze ukuba kuhlawulwe kwiPerformance Zone Inc. ngememo: "Edson Pavoni: Orbital Temple"
